languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Мехадендрит{/g} с буром осторожно вытягивается в сторону кровавой каши, бывшей мозгом Идиры, и обмакивает в нее острие.{/n} "Я сохраню органический образец для изучения".

traits.locale_text: {n}Механодендрит с буром осторожно вытягивается в сторону кровавой каши, бывшей мозгом Идиры, и обмакивает в нее острие.{/n} "Я сохраню органический образец для изучения".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Wielding a sampling tool, a {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} carefully reaches out toward the bloody mess that used to be Idira's brain and dips the tip into it.{/n} "I will preserve an organic specimen for future study."
languages.original_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Мехадендрит{/g} с буром осторожно вытягивается в сторону кровавой каши, бывшей мозгом Идиры, и обмакивает в нее острие.{/n} "Я сохраню органический образец для изучения".

traits.locale_text: {n}Wielding a sampling tool, a {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} carefully reaches out toward the bloody mess that used to be Idira's brain and dips the tip into it.{/n} "I will preserve an organic specimen for future study."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Wielding a sampling tool, a {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} carefully reaches out toward the bloody mess that used to be Idira's brain and dips the tip into it.{/n} "I will preserve an organic specimen for future study."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}一条{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}机械触须{/g}手中挥舞着采样工具，小心翼翼地伸向了曾是伊迪拉大脑的血肉，将尖端浸入其中。{/n}“我准备保留一份有机样本，供将来进行研究。”
languages.original_text: {n}Wielding a sampling tool, a {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} carefully reaches out toward the bloody mess that used to be Idira's brain and dips the tip into it.{/n} "I will preserve an organic specimen for future study."

traits.locale_text: {n}一条{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}机械触须{/g}手中挥舞着采样工具，小心翼翼地伸向了曾是伊迪拉大脑的血肉，将尖端浸入其中。{/n}“我准备保留一份有机样本，供将来进行研究。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Aferrando una herramienta de muestreo, una {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mecadendrita{/g} se acerca con cuidado a la masa sangrienta que antes era el cerebro de Idira e introduce su extremo en ella.{/n} «Conservaré un espécimen orgánico para su posterior estudio».
languages.original_text: {n}Wielding a sampling tool, a {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} carefully reaches out toward the bloody mess that used to be Idira's brain and dips the tip into it.{/n} "I will preserve an organic specimen for future study."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aferrando una herramienta de muestreo, una {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mecadendrita{/g} se acerca con cuidado a la masa sangrienta que antes era el cerebro de Idira e introduce su extremo en ella.{/n} «Conservaré un espécimen orgánico para su posterior estudio».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}がサンプリングツールを掴んでイディラの脳だった血まみれの一部へと注意深く伸ばされ、その先端を浸した。{/n}「将来の研究のために、有機標本を保存しておきます」
languages.original_text: {n}Wielding a sampling tool, a {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} carefully reaches out toward the bloody mess that used to be Idira's brain and dips the tip into it.{/n} "I will preserve an organic specimen for future study."

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}がサンプリングツールを掴んでイディラの脳だった血まみれの一部へと注意深く伸ばされ、その先端を浸した。{/n}「将来の研究のために、有機標本を保存しておきます」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Mit einem Analysewerkzeug bewaffnet, nähert sich ein {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mechadendrit{/g} vorsichtig der blutigen Masse, die einmal Idiras Gehirn war und steckt die Spitze hinein.{/n} "Ich entnehme eine Gewebeprobe zur weiteren Analyse."
languages.original_text: {n}Wielding a sampling tool, a {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} carefully reaches out toward the bloody mess that used to be Idira's brain and dips the tip into it.{/n} "I will preserve an organic specimen for future study."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem Analysewerkzeug bewaffnet, nähert sich ein {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mechadendrit{/g} vorsichtig der blutigen Masse, die einmal Idiras Gehirn war und steckt die Spitze hinein.{/n} "Ich entnehme eine Gewebeprobe zur weiteren Analyse."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Munie d'un outil de prélèvement, une {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadendrite{/g} s'approche prudemment du cadavre d'Idira avant d'en plonger l'extrémité dans le tas de chairs sanguinolentes qui était autrefois son cerveau.{/n} « Je vais conserver un échantillon de cellules pour analyse. »
languages.original_text: {n}Wielding a sampling tool, a {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} carefully reaches out toward the bloody mess that used to be Idira's brain and dips the tip into it.{/n} "I will preserve an organic specimen for future study."

traits.locale_text: {n}Munie d'un outil de prélèvement, une {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadendrite{/g} s'approche prudemment du cadavre d'Idira avant d'en plonger l'extrémité dans le tas de chairs sanguinolentes qui était autrefois son cerveau.{/n} « Je vais conserver un échantillon de cellules pour analyse. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Numune alma aleti tutan bir {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mekadentrit{/g}, önceden İdira'nın beyni olan kanlı yığına uzanıp ucunu yığının içine batırıyor.{/n} "Gelecekteki çalışmalar için organik bir örneği saklayacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Wielding a sampling tool, a {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} carefully reaches out toward the bloody mess that used to be Idira's brain and dips the tip into it.{/n} "I will preserve an organic specimen for future study."

traits.locale_text: {n}Numune alma aleti tutan bir {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mekadentrit{/g}, önceden İdira'nın beyni olan kanlı yığına uzanıyor ve ucunu yığının içine batırıyor.{/n} "Gelecekteki çalışmalar için organik bir örneği saklayacağım."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
